summary: This adds pillars of light to the pools on the College of Winterhold\'s bridge.
descriptionHtml:
This adds pillars of light to the pools on the College of Winterhold\'s bridge.

I recommend using NMM to install this.

If you want o manually install it. it goes into the Data folder in the skyrim directory at the following file path for windows 7 C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
author: Bwins95
